title: How to get started with Azure Image Builder | Azure Tips and Tricks
excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to get started with Azure Image Builder.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free
